Transforming lives in Western Australia with compassion and strength. We provide holistic, empowering support to those facing mental health challenges, domestic violence, and marginalisation.

WHO WE ARE

OUR VISION A one-stop community services hub providing holistic person-centred support towards independence and wellbeing.
OUR MISSION To support, equip, connect, and empower individuals and families, transitioning and transforming lives from surviving to thriving.
WE SERVE Individuals facing mental health, domestic violence victims, grieving families, marginalised elders, children with disabilities, and disadvantaged families.
Joshie's Hub This service enables children with physical and intellectual disabilities to acquire life skills and discover meaningful roles in society. Visit the page
Barnabas Life Services Run by volunteers, Barnabas Life Services is a 24-hour response service that provides non-perishable essential items and cooked food to disadvantaged individuals and families in the community. Visit the page
Education Services To equip and empower individuals who have been unable to connect with mainstream educational services. Visit the page
At the forefront in Western Australia, we're a beacon of hope and transformation, dedicated to empowering and uplifting lives. Our holistic support extends to those battling mental health issues, suffering from domestic violence, and living on society's fringes. We champion the cause of marginalised elders, children with disabilities, and disadvantaged families, striving tirelessly to transition them from mere survival to a thriving existence. Join us in shaping a compassionate, resilient community where everyone finds the support they need to flourish.
